Task 1: Heat Maps


```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(wesanderson)
library(tvthemes)
library (tidyverse)
library (dplyr)
library (cowplot)
library (viridis)
NPGE_PDO.dat <- read.csv("/Users/alexandrareich/Desktop/DataVIzFish/Work_dir/npgo-pdo.csv")
```

Heat Map 1: Show NPGO by month and year
```{r}
ggplot(data=NPGE_PDO.dat)+aes(x= Year,  y= Mon, fill=NPGO)+ scale_fill_viridis()+theme_cowplot()+geom_tile()
```

```{r}
ggplot(data=NPGE_PDO.dat)+aes(x= Year,  y= Mon, fill=NPGO)+ scale_fill_avatar(palette = "FireNation", type="continuous")+theme_avatar() +geom_tile()
```
